sentences.en: A good carpenter can make a cupboard to fit the most awkward space.
sentences.cn: 就算是再尴尬的空间，好木匠也能做一个合适的橱柜。

sentences.en: A laugh can help people over an awkward situation.
sentences.cn: 笑可以助人化解尴尬。

sentences.en: Alexandra looked plump and awkward in her cast-off clothing.
sentences.cn: 亚历山德拉穿着那身过时的衣裳，显得臃肿笨拙。

sentences.en: Amy made an awkward gesture with her hands.
sentences.cn: 埃米笨拙地做了个手势。

sentences.en: An aerosol spray will make short work of painting awkward objects.
sentences.cn: 用喷罐来喷涂，不好对付的物品也能轻松搞定。

sentences.en: an awkward silence
sentences.cn: 令人尴尬的沉默

sentences.en: Full-size tripods can be awkward, especially if you'reshooting a low-level subject.
sentences.cn: 标准尺寸的三脚架可能会不便于使用，用于拍摄低角度的物体时尤其如此。

sentences.en: Geoff looked uneasy and awkward.
sentences.cn: 杰夫看上去紧张不安。

sentences.en: Grass shears are specially made to trim grass growing in awkward places.
sentences.cn: 除草剪刀；专门用于修剪缝隙角落里的青草。

sentences.en: He broke from prevailing orthodoxies and asked the awkward questions.
sentences.cn: 他抛开盛行的正统观念，问了一些难以回答的问题。

sentences.en: His gangling, awkward gait has earned him the name Spiderman.
sentences.cn: 他又瘦又高，动作笨拙难看，因此有了“蜘蛛人”的外号。

sentences.en: I feel awkward and shy in company.
sentences.cn: 跟别人在一起的时候，我觉得很别扭，不好意思。

sentences.en: I hoped he would stop asking awkward questions .
sentences.cn: 我希望他不要再问令人难堪的问题。

sentences.en: I'm always being told off for being so awkward.
sentences.cn: 我笨手笨脚的，总挨训。

sentences.en: In an awkward press conference, Mr King parried questions on the allegations.
sentences.cn: 在一场尴尬的新闻发布会上，金先生回避了有关指控的问题。

sentences.en: It was small but heavy enough to make it awkward to carry.
sentences.cn: 它虽然小，但很重，不便携带。

sentences.en: It’ll be awkward getting cars in and out.
sentences.cn: 这样汽车就不好进出了。

sentences.en: Make sure no awkward stretching is required.
sentences.cn: 确定不用做太难的伸展动作。

sentences.en: Make sure that the baby is not sleeping in an awkward position.
sentences.cn: 要确保小宝宝睡姿舒服。

sentences.en: Philip’s remarks put her in an awkward position (=  made it difficult for her to know what to do  ) .
sentences.cn: 菲利普的话使她很窘迫。

sentences.en: She liked to dance but felt awkward if someone was watching her.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢跳舞，但要是有人看着，她就觉得不舒服。

sentences.en: She was afraid he was going to ask an awkward question.
sentences.cn: 她担心他会问出不好回答的问题。

sentences.en: She's got to an age where she is being awkward.
sentences.cn: 她到了难相处的年龄。

sentences.en: The body was twisted, its legs at an awkward angle.
sentences.cn: 身体扭曲变形，双腿弯成别扭的角度。

sentences.en: The new financial arrangements were awkward to manage.
sentences.cn: 新的财务安排不好操作。

sentences.en: The ten-foot oars felt heavy and awkward.
sentences.cn: 10英尺长的桨拿起来感觉很笨重。

sentences.en: There was an awkward moment when she didn’t know whether to shake his hand or kiss his cheek.
sentences.cn: 她不知道是该跟他握手还是亲他的脸颊，一时很尴尬。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, Grandma always seems to awaken at awkward moments.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，奶奶好像总是醒来的不是时候。

trans.tran_cn: 使人尴尬的，棘手的，难使用的，不方便的，危险的，难携带的，笨拙的，别扭的，害羞的，不可理喻的，难相处的
